name: antd-xlsx
description: Export an Excel file based on the columns and dataSource parameters of the antd Table component

scripts.build-modern: microbundle src/style.js src/nostyle.js -o dist/esm --compress true -f modern
scripts.build-cjs: microbundle src/style.js src/nostyle.js -o dist/cjs --compress true -f cjs
scripts.cp-entries: cpy src/esm.js dist/esm --rename=index.js --flat && cpy src/cjs.js dist/cjs --rename=index.js --flat
scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build-modern && npm run build-cjs && npm run cp-entries
scripts.gh-pages: rimraf docs && cpy example-vite2/dist-pages/index.html docs --flat && cpy example-vite2/dist-pages/assets docs/assets --flat

author: hellobq
